title: ZAGG launches AppleCare alternative with fixed fees and used device coverage for iPhones
content:
ZAGG is out with its latest launch today looking to improve the experience of protecting iPhones (and other smartphones). With its AppleCare alternative called ZAGG Protect, three features stand out: a fixed $49 deductible, coverage for liquid damage, and the ability to cover new and used iPhones alike.

more…

The post ZAGG launches AppleCare alternative with fixed fees and used device coverage for iPhones appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: The new ZAGG Protect AppleCare alternative has arrived with features like a fixed $49 deductible, liquid damage protection, and more.
